title: The Royal British Legion will offer poppies in all UK communities
subtitle: The charity has confirmed poppies will be offered “in every community in the UK.”
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
The Royal British Legion will offer poppies in all UK communities

A Facebook post claiming to show the Royal British Legion saying it will offer poppies in every community in the UK is true. It’s a screenshot of a genuine Royal British Legion Facebook post from 2016.

The Royal British Legion’s post was published in response to a false viral rumour that poppies would not be distributed in certain areas because they will upset minorities. 

 

 Similar claims are made each year, and the charity has routinely stated that these are false.

In response to the latest viral claims a representative for the charity told Full Fact:



“We are aware that there are statements online suggesting the poppy is not being offered in certain areas of the country. We'd like to reassure you that this is categorically untrue. We are proud to offer the poppy in every community in the UK — we always have been and always will be.”
